definition: tree trunk/main part of sth/to manage/to work/to do/capable/cadre/to kill (slang)/to fuck (vulgar)

sentences.english: A naturally mummified Chinchorro child found in a Chilean desert.
sentences.chinese: 一具在智利沙漠发现的自然风干的新克罗小孩木乃伊。

sentences.english: Her light-gray paint job has dried.
sentences.chinese: 浅灰色的油漆已经风干。

sentences.english: You can air dry sports bras to prolong the life of the moisture-wicking fabrics.
sentences.chinese: 你可以风干胸罩以延长防汗面料的使用寿命。

sentences.english: Pigs were butchered, hams were hung to dry from the ceiling.
sentences.chinese: 杀了猪，猪腿挂在天花板上风干。

sentences.english: Waxed meat hanging at the balcony.
The dry my tears, I have made you hide in my heart.
sentences.chinese: 晨光风干了我的泪滴，我却把你藏在了心底。

sentences.english: Dried milk curd can be preserved for an extremely long time.
sentences.chinese: 风干的奶豆腐可以保存很久。

sentences.english: These buildings are made of adobe brick.
sentences.chinese: 这些建筑都是由风干的砖坯砌成。

sentences.english: At some stages I had 80 pounds of meat hanging in the closet drying.
sentences.chinese: 在某些阶段，我在橱柜里挂了约80磅肉风干。

sentences.english: People of Jianshui like enjoying this special air-dried and fermented flavor.
sentences.chinese: 建水人很会享用这种由风干和发酵打造出的特殊味道。

sentences.english: Don't leave it on skin over 10 minutes or let it air-dry on skin.
sentences.chinese: 切勿超过10分钟或让脱毛膏于肌肤上风干。

sentences.english: I feel like I'm riding into a hairdryer half the time. Well, it's time for the real adventure to begin.
sentences.chinese: 我感觉自己像是一半时间骑行在风干机里面。

sentences.english: Just use mousse or gel and then let it air-dry .
sentences.chinese: 只要抹一些慕丝或发胶，然后让它自然风干。

sentences.english: Racks of drying fish hang under the eaves of farmhouses.
sentences.chinese: 农家屋檐下挂着一架架正在风干的鱼。

sentences.english: Is Lang Gei the joy, my air seasoning has been lonely.
sentences.chinese: 是郎给的快乐，我风干了寂寞。

sentences.english: In another dish, deep-fried bits of dried beef were cooked, in a touch of fusion, with pine nuts.
sentences.chinese: 风干牛肉切块炸过之后与松子很好地配成了一道菜。

definition: to smoke/to cure over a wood fire
marinated/to make by pickling, salting or curing
to dry (of weather, paint, cement etc)/desiccation/dull/uninteresting/arid
(of the sun) to scorch/to expose to a scorching sun
